 Kali::
"Then"said kali " Follow me"
 
Kali walked to a corritor
  logomorph@... wrote: Panzer::

She gave a slightly evil smirk.  "I wish to improve my current skills 
and weapon proficensies. How can can I aquire these skills and 
weapons?" Her ears moves to home in on Kali and absorb all the words 
that came from his mouth. Her tail swished slolwy behind her.  She 
started to smile at the thought of becoming better than her current 
programming. She let out a slight purr. 



--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Kali:::
>

to 
> the feline-bot and said with a smile "Well, Panzer, I was thinking 
> that your skills could been improved if you like... YOu see. You 
can 
> get new and best weapons and stuff like that if you want..."
>
